alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:54PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson County through 400 PM CDT... At 254 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fayette, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fayette around 305 PM CDT. Red Lick and Mcnair around 325 PM CDT. Blue Hill around 400 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern Mississippi.
